description:
A female neighborhood friend of Leila has decided to get married. Leila was obviously invited to the wedding, but she also wanted Ringo and Natsuki to come to the ceremony. “Why us?” is their first reaction, but then the reason becomes apparent: the groom’s their teacher Mr. Atsui! He wants Ringo and Natsuki to be the bride’s veil girls and entrusted Leila with the important task of delivering the bride’s present. What kind of present is it? To answer that, Mr. Atsui shows the girls a picture of him and a giant shoe. The shoe is so big that the girls are blown away. But he says that it fits the bride perfectly…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ビッグなシンデレラ☆ぷりっ!
